content: these armwarmers have a striking ribbed pattern that radiates out from the inside forearm and converges on the outside forearm the thumb shaping grows cunningly out of the radiating ribs now available through the above link in english and german deutsch thanks to the translation skills of spiro 2 this pattern is free for personal use if you really love it you can tip me on ko-fi 3 the original yarn specified is discontinued any fingering weight yarn with some elasticity should be fine if you d use it to knit socks you can use it to knit marywarmers **errata ** the original pattern published in *australian knitting* magazine has errors in the left thumb gap and join section rounds 117-120 the pdf available through ravelry includes the corrected instructions the correct instructions for rounds 117-120 are r117 work 17 st in straight 2x2 rib pattern as for plain cuff slip next 18 st onto waste yarn or stitch holder co 8 st rejoin round and work to end of round in straight 2x2 rib r118 work 17 st in straight 2x2 rib p8 work to end of round in straight 2x2 rib r119 work 17 st in straight 2x2 rib p2tog 4 times work to end of round in straight 2x2 rib r120 work 17 st in straight 2x2 rib p2tog 2 times work to end of round in straight 2x2 rib result 72 st remain 2 http //www ravelry com/people/spiro 3 https //ko-fi com/verylisa
